005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
009
010public interface IFlagInstance extends IFlag, IValuedInstance, IInstanceAbsolute {
011
012  boolean DEFAULT_FLAG_REQUIRED = false;
013
014  @Override
015  IModelDefinition getParentContainer();
016
017  @Override
018  IFlagDefinition getDefinition();
019
020  @Override
021  default IModelDefinition getContainingDefinition() {
022    return getParentContainer();
023  }
024
025  /**
026   * Determines if a flag value is required to be provided.
027   *
028   * @return {@code true} if a value is required, or {@code false} otherwise
029   * @see #DEFAULT_FLAG_REQUIRED
030   */
031  default boolean isRequired() {
032    return DEFAULT_FLAG_REQUIRED;
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  default QName getReferencedDefinitionQName() {
037    return getContainingModule().toFlagQName(getName());
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  default QName getXmlQName() {
042    // flags do not have a namespace by default
043    return getContainingModule().toFlagQName(getEffectiveName());
044  }
045}
